listitem.para: Appends item to the listbox portion of the combobox that is identified by name.

programlisting.userinput:
TO DODRAW CLEARSCREEN MAKE "sides FIRST COMBOBOXGETTEXT "mycombo REPEAT :sides [FORWARD 50 RIGHT 360.0/:sides] END
WINDOWCREATE "main "mywindow "mytitle 0 0 100 100 [] COMBOBOXCREATE "mywindow "mycombo 25 0 50 50 COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [3] COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [4] COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [5] COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [6] BUTTONCREATE "mywindow "mydraw "Draw 25 50 50 25 [DODRAW]
programlisting.replaceable: Select or enter number of sides from combobox and then click the Draw button
